amendment.description: Amendment sought to require transparency in swaps contracts by requiring all non-cleared swaps be executed on a registered swap execution facility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-370 to require transparency in swaps contracts by requiring all non-cleared swaps be executed on a registered swap execution facility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 330 (Roll no. 958).
